医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Microgreens：未来的超级食品，富含营养且易于种植Heliyon 的评论强调了微型蔬菜的营养优势、种植方法和健康益处，强调了它们在全球健康和环境挑战中作为可持续功能食品的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Microgreens-Superfoods-for-the-future-packed-with- Nutritions-and-easy-to-grow.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Microgreens-Superfoods-for-the-future-packed-with- Nutritions-and-easy-to-grow.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77c0f776-e282-43b2-9641-447cf3177bde Mon, 12 Feb 2024 23:31:00 -0500 Microgreens: Superfoods for the future, packed with nutrients and easy to grow
不仅仅是浆果：黑苦莓的多方面健康益处综述强调了黑苦莓（Aronia melanocarpa）在疾病控制和预防方面的潜力，重点关注其丰富的多酚含量及其对人体发挥抗病特性的多种机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Beyond-just-a-berry-The-multifaceted-health-benefits-of-black-chokeberry.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Beyond-just-a-berry-The-multifaceted-health-benefits-of-black-chokeberry.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6901dc7d-6f4f-4a53-92f5-a8f7c7229e40 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 23:05:00 -0500 Beyond just a berry: The multifaceted health benefits of black chokeberry
探讨英国青少年对未来为人父母的担忧及其生殖健康教育伦敦大学学院研究人员的两项新研究发现，近一半的青少年担心生孩子，许多人缺乏生殖健康知识。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Exploring-UK-teenagers-concerns-about-future-parenthood-and-their-reproductive-health-education.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Exploring-UK-teenagers-concerns-about-future-parenthood-and-their-reproductive-health-education.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f599d883-3e35-4cb5-b965-5772631f523a Mon, 12 Feb 2024 22:41:40 -0500 Exploring UK teenagers' concerns about future parenthood and their reproductive health education
研究表明症状性头晕与较高的死亡风险有关研究探讨了症状性头晕与全因死亡率增加之间的联系，特别强调了与糖尿病和心血管疾病死亡率的关联，强调了有效管理和进一步研究的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Study-links-symptomatic-dizziness-to-higher-mortality-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Study-links-symptomatic-dizziness-to-higher-mortality-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fdc43202-a95c-41d7-9a98-22886bf995c6 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 22:34:00 -0500 Study links symptomatic dizziness to higher mortality risk
研究发现吸烟、饮酒和饮食习惯与头颈癌风险相关《美国医学会杂志》耳鼻咽喉头颈外科研究研究了吸烟、饮酒和饮食习惯与患头颈癌 (HNC) 风险之间的联系，强调了生活方式选择对癌症风险的显着影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Smoking-drinking-and-dietary-habits-linked-to-head-and-neck-cancer-risk-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Smoking-drinking-and-dietary-habits-linked-to-head-and-neck-cancer-risk-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eafeca2e-ef26-437d-af05-754012bdaf78 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 22:25:00 -0500 Smoking, drinking, and dietary habits linked to head and neck cancer risk, study finds
疗养院的数字远程监控技术减少了住院人数英国健康数据研究中心 (HDR UK) Better Care 计划今天在 Age 杂志上发表的一项新研究发现，在疗养院使用数字远程监控技术可以将医院急诊就诊率减少 11%，紧急入院率减少 25%和老龄化——英国老年医学会的官方期刊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Digital-remote-monitoring-technology-in-care-homes-reduces-hospital-admissions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Digital-remote-monitoring-technology-in-care-homes-reduces-hospital-admissions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86d4ad60-9e3c-476c-a7dc-d71fd184fe7a Mon, 12 Feb 2024 22:00:00 -0500 Digital remote monitoring technology in care homes reduces hospital admissions
新的 CRISPR-COPIES 促进基因编辑CRISPR/Cas 系统在过去十年中取得了巨大进步。这些精确的基因组编辑工具的应用范围从转基因作物开发到基因治疗等。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Gene-editing-gets-a-boost-with-new-CRISPR-COPIES.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Gene-editing-gets-a-boost-with-new-CRISPR-COPIES.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ca00e0d-f4db-4d5c-88b2-14e5bb916b6f Mon, 12 Feb 2024 21:54:04 -0500 Gene editing gets a boost with new CRISPR-COPIES
COVID-19 对嗅觉和大脑健康的持久影响揭晓研究回顾了 COVID-19 对嗅觉功能障碍的影响及其与神经认知障碍的联系，强调了 MRI 结果和嗅觉丧失的潜在治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/COVID-19s-having-impact-on-smell-and-brain-health-unveiled.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/COVID-19s-having-impact-on-smell-and-brain-health-unveiled.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56853201-0a88-489b-a84f-0c9ea1a5a507 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 21:52:00 -0500 COVID-19's lasting impact on smell and brain health unveiled
研究：十分之一的怀孕新冠幸存者面临长期症状尽管关于新冠病毒对普通成年人口的长期影响的研究越来越多，但关于新冠病毒对怀孕期间感染新冠病毒的长期影响的研究却很少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Study-1-in-10-pregnant-COVID-survivors-face-long-term-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Study-1-in-10-pregnant-COVID-survivors-face-long-term-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=feb52630-ffb2-4789-a53f-f46fc6a0e118 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 21:45:27 -0500 Study: 1 in 10 pregnant COVID survivors face long-term symptoms
农村各州疫情期间园艺和觅食与改善粮食安全有关对新英格兰农村居民的最新研究表明，园艺、狩猎、捕鱼和其他 HWFP 活动是在流行病或气候变化事件等极端事件中维持粮食安全的重要工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Gardening-and-foraging-linked-with-improved-food-security-during-the-pandemic-in-rural-states.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Gardening-and-foraging-linked-with-improved-food-security-during-the-pandemic-in-rural-states.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47878aa4-5b0b-4738-9da1-e02062aafe4b Mon, 12 Feb 2024 21:41:10 -0500 Gardening and foraging associated with improved food security during the pandemic in rural states
